Tuck

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Speaking of... was conference question
messages.msgSnippet: ... she ... Nancy - Mary is currently posting again at the unschooling.com message boards. She told me she had to take a break from the boards and list so she
messages.messageBody:
> Hey! Where is our *Life is good* Mary? And Tuck! Where is she? I am sure
she
> has gotten moved in, hasn't she?
> ~Nancy who hopes you guys have read this and know we are missing you both!


Nancy - Mary is currently posting again at the unschooling.com message
boards.
She told me she had to take a break from the boards and list so she could
spend more uninterrupted time with her kids.
I'm not sure where Tuck is, but she was at the conference!

Karin

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Speaking of... was conference question
messages.msgSnippet: Nancy, I went on the unschooling.com message board and asked the same question.  I think they are all recovering from the conference and I know Sandra is
messages.messageBody:
Nancy,
I went on the unschooling.com message board and asked the same question. I think they are all recovering from the conference and I know Sandra is recovering from breaking her leg or ankle? She just got out of the hospital. Maybe you know this but thought I'd clue you in if you didn't.
Kelli
Dnowens@... wrote:In a message dated 10/16/02 4:47:26 PM Central Daylight Time, curtkar@...
writes:


> Marji, remember me? The tall, slim one with straight brown hair (hanging
> around Mary/zenmomma?)
>
Hey! Where is our *Life is good* Mary? And Tuck! Where is she? I am sure she
has gotten moved in, hasn't she?
~Nancy who hopes you guys have read this and know we are missing you both!
